tool.name: DnaBimodality
tool.description: : Determine binormality/bimodality from a helical parameter series dataset.

param.name: input_csv_file
param.label: input CSV file
param.help: Path to .csv file with helical parameter series. If `input_zip_file` is passed, this should be just the filename of the .csv file inside .zip. Format: [input].csv

param.name: outname_output_csv_path
param.label: output CSV name
param.help: Path to .csv file where output is saved Format: [output].csv

param.name: outname_output_jpg_path
param.label: output JPG name
param.help: Path to .jpg file where output is saved Format: [output].jpg

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: confidence_level
param.label: confidence_level
param.help: Confidence level for Byes Factor test (in percentage).

param.name: max_iter
param.label: max_iter
param.help: Number of maximum iterations for EM algorithm.
